hero.title: Discover Your Path to Success with AI
hero.subtitle: AI-powered platform to map your skills, find opportunities, and build your future
hero.developmentText: We're working hard to bring you an amazing platform. Join our waitlist to be the first to know when we launch!

features.title: AI-Powered Features We Offer in
features.subtitle: A comprehensive AI-enhanced platform that helps you discover your career path and develop your skills with intelligent guidance

cards.title: AI Mentor & Learning Assistant
cards.description: Personalized AI mentor powered by advanced RAG technology that provides accurate, domain-specific answers and guidance tailored to your learning journey

cards.title: Career Assessment Test
cards.description: Personality analysis test that helps you discover the most suitable professional field for your skills and interests

cards.title: Learning Community
cards.description: Connect with other learners in the same field and share experiences and tips

cards.title: Specialized Courses
cards.description: Specialized training courses provided by experts in various professional fields

cards.title: Professional Consultations
cards.description: Consultation sessions with experts to help you make appropriate professional decisions

cards.title: Job Opportunities
cards.description: Connect with hiring companies and job opportunities suitable for your skills after completing the learning path

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: We're proud to collaborate with leading organizations that share our vision for empowering youth through technology and education

waitlist.title: Join Our Waitlist
waitlist.subtitle: Be among the first users of the platform and get early access and exclusive benefits
